items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wearing on our cruize
items.body: I am going on a few day cruize for my daughters 25th B-day and we wanted to dress up for 1 night for dinner. This dress is so reasonably priced for the quality. It fits perfect in all the right places and looks so elegant and modern. I did replace the ribbon that came with it for the back bc it was only enough for every other loop on the lace up and I wanted to leave everyone but that chooses $2.00 so not a big concern. I am so excited to wear it out!° Read more
items.author: carla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: It’s really pretty but I had to get it tailored to fit Read more
items.author: Yalanda Cannon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Show out
items.body: This was a beautiful dress. Got lots of compliments. Wore this to a wedding since the grooms side of the family was themed gold. I loved how it had like bra pads in them already. The color and fabric and pattern was really pretty. Pockets was an all time plus! Now couple of things. You get what you paid for. You can some of the sowing was loose but workable. It's also really long and I wish I had tome to get it tailored. I wore pretty tall platforms and it was still long. Had to hold up my dress to walk so it was hard to party in. Last thing is, when you get hot and start sweating, it doesn't feel that great on the fabric lol other than those, love this dress! Read more
items.author: Mariana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: My sister bought this for my wedding! She look so amazing. The fit was so pretty on her. She was very comfortable and we loved the way it flowed with her all night. The material is not stretchy however the overall look quality was a 10. NOTE: The gown is not open like this lol. My sister entrance she swung it open lol Read more
items.author: Raquel Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Show stopper dress
items.body: This dress was the talk of the show I turned alot of heads its really beautiful I loved it . The fit was to die for. It gave me alot of compliments. Read more
items.author: ROCHELLE WILLIAMS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It had pockets!
items.body: Most girls love a nice gown with pockets! Lol I did have to get it tailored at the top. It was a little long with the train in the back but I kept it that way. The split seems a little awkward, you have to really work to show it but the quality was amazing. Not a thin material. Very good for the price. Read more
items.author: Christian Cashelle

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars if you cannot fit it, you will not get your refund back 100% just an FYI.
items.body: Honestly the dress is what I expected the material is thin but i figured I only need it for one night. I ended up not being able to fit the dress so I attempted to return it. The person literally tried negotiating a return price, which is crazy. First, they offered for me to just give send it back to them and they can tailor it and send it back, which I didn’t want to do because the event was in a few days so no time . So then they offered to give me $20 back which is even more crazy. I declined then they offered to give me $30 back and for me to keep. They ended up refunding me 45 which is what they say is the max they can refund and I’m just going to donate it ti charity or something . If the dress fits your perfectly fine, but if you cannot fit it, you will not get your refund back 100% just an FYI. Read more
items.author: Jariana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: Great quality, I loved the thick satin type fabric, fits well I wear a 12 in jeans and ordered the 16 plus for size reference. It’s beautiful. My only complaint is the gold color is a little more yellow gold than a true gold. It won’t match the color I needed it to. Read more
items.author: Mrs. Núñez

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening One Shoulder Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening One Shoulder Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Aqua, Olive Green, Fuchsia, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Deep Pink, Dusty Blue, Orange, Peacock, Plum, Lavender, Royal Blue, Mustard Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
